title: New: oOoOO – Forlorn Dub
body: Brand new material from **Triangle Records** fave,  [**oOoOO**](http://soundcloud.com/ooooosounds), is always met with excitement. This slow and steady new cut is no exception. Riding a walking bass, sprinkles of sound surround and gently enter the vicinity of the track, creating a world tinged with longing and regret. Perhaps his most outwardly minimal work to date, it seems the producer is taking risks when it comes to his practice . More when we get it.
